stories.text: HN's small font size comes up once in a while. It's not much of a problem since all major browsers can zoom pages but I'm curious what level of zoom the average reader uses, if any.
stories.title: Poll: How much zoom do you use to read HN?

stories.text:
Musk not buying Twitter because of the apparent fake account ‘problem’ is absurd. Of course Twitter has fake accounts and automated bots that are hooked up to Twitter’s API and perform automated tweeting. You can even declare in Twitter’s settings that the account is automated and let followers know the account is automated.

Some amount of automation on Twitter is good. Troll farms spreading disinformation may be bad however, so I can see an issue with that, but come on, why did musk bail on the deal?
stories.title: Ask HN: Are Twitter bots a real problem?
House Price Declines: How Long for Real Prices to Recover?
